name: Federation of Regional Growth Actors in Europe
goal: FEDRA is a regional affairs expertise hub whose objective is to inform and engage its members and partners in regional policies, projects and networks. To ensure such a level of expertise, we provide our members with the advice of a “Pool of Regional Experts” composed of senior professionals and the skills of our “Advisory Board” coming from the private, public and academic world. With its unique database of 20,000 key regional influencers in more than 300 European regions, FEDRA is able to design projects for its partners, and stimulate bonds between them to create regional growth ecosystems.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Digital Europe
Neighbourhood policy
EU Structural funds and cohesion policy
Growth initiatives
Youth & Culture
Food
